description: This file defines the DeliveryFragment class, which manages the UI for tracking delivery orders in an Android application. It handles rendering order details, progress, and timeline updates, and interacts with the application's ViewModel and repository for data handling.

classes.name: DeliveryFragment
classes.description: A fragment responsible for displaying delivery order tracking UI, including status progress, timeline, and interaction with delivery data.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the ViewModel and RecyclerView adapter.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Binds view elements, sets click listeners, and sets up LiveData observers to refresh UI.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the UI based on the current delivery order and ETA data.

methods.name: buildTimelineRows
methods.description: Generates a list of timeline row data for the delivery stages.

methods.name: formatCountdown
methods.description: Formats seconds into a string like 'Xm Ys'.
